column1: #Text=Little Chou says : " Nobody steals from the Chou brothers ! "
#Text=" Wan says : " Actually , I feel quite alive .
#Text=" Wan says : " He - he - hey , fellas !
#Text=" Little Chou says : " I told you no one steals from us .
#Text=" Jaya says : " Did you steal from the Chous again ?
#Text=" Wan says : " Yeah , and I got to nothing show for it except a few dirty rolls and a whole lot of bruises .
#Text=Hey , Yao , I got some food for you .
